transcript:
Customer: Hello

Executive: Hello
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hi, good afternoon sir, main Shorya baat kar raha hun IndiaMART se. Kal call kiya tha na Amit ji ne.
Customer: Jarurat nahi hai mujhe call karne ki.
Executive: Sir aap hi ne ek ticket raise kiya hua hai.
Customer: Sorry. Sorry.
Executive: Koi kuch nahi hai.
Customer: Saab jehre oh kar rahe aa.
Customer: Milavat wala tel paalde, milavat wala paalde original koi nahi mangda.
Executive: To woh to aap lead check karo na lead pe ki kya rate mein mang rahe ho ki sab pe aap lead kar paoge na.
Customer: Rate 140 mang rahe aa. 140 main kaise de du?
Executive: Haan nahi to woh wali lead aap use karo ji matlab aap buyleads to check karo na.
Customer: Koi bhi nahi hai, ek bhi nahi hai.
Customer: Main bathereyan kar liya check. Hun mera ta mann mann udas ho chukka, main nahi use karda.
Customer: Te ehnu close kar do mere account nu.
Executive: Ji sir.
Customer: Useless aa mera 30,000 rupaiya, 30,000 rupaiya waste gaya. Main ta Facebook te ek din video bana ke te pauni aa.
Customer: Te mera bilkul waste gaya sara, koi bhi eh cheez jehdi aa oh na kharide.
Customer: Video pauni aa main hun.
Executive: Accha aap
Customer: Nahi video kadho theek hai, main samajh gaya aapki video ka. Kyunki Punjab mein aur teen char company hai jo hamare paas registered hai.
Customer: To woh bhi to kar hi rahe hai.
Executive: Registered to main bhi hun, mere bare mein aap keh hi sakte ho.
Customer: Mere bare bhi aap keh hi sakte ho ki main registered hun. Par mainu benefit nahi hoya ek rupaye da bhi benefit nahi hoya mainu, ek rupaye da bhi.
Executive: Haan ji woh main samajh gaya ki aapko benefit nahi hua tabhi aapne feedback diya. Ab jaise woh Jalandhar aur Amritsar mein bhi companies hai jo yeh kaam karte hai apna. To main wohi samajhna chahta tha.
Customer: Ho sakta woh milavat karde hon, ho sakta woh milavat karde hon.
Customer: Main nahi karda.
Executive: To usme aapki jo rate hai us rate ki koi bhi valid nahi dikhti aapko?
Customer: Na, koi nahi hai.
Executive: 40 rupaye ghat mangde aa.
Executive: Aur yeh jo aapne jo rate dale hue hai woh rate theek hai?
Customer: Bilkul theek aa, genuine rate dale main.
Customer: Par yeh alag alag rate aa, jaise retail, retail jisko pata ke tel vadiya 170 ka per liter leke jate aa. Yeh 140 ka demand karte main kaise de du?
Executive: Haan ji main samajh gaya.
Executive: To 170 per liter ke hisab se aapka minimum quantity kitna rehta hai?
Customer: Minimum quantity, sir kisi ne koi 5 liter leke jana, koi 4 liter leke jana, apne domestic consumption layi aa.
Executive: To woh aap de dete ho?
Customer: Bilkul deta hun je 170 milega to.
Executive: Aur yeh man lo agar kuch kyunki usme kya hota hai na log online isliye search karte kyunki they expect ki unke ghar pe mil jaye delivery. To woh bhi aap karate ho ki logo ko lene aana padega aapke paas?
Customer: Nahi yeh ta yeh ta nearest jehre hege aa na 8-10 pinta, othon log aap hi le jande aa.
Executive: Theek hai. Aur agar thoda sa dur hoga to at least 5 liter, 10 liter man ke chale?
Customer: Haan woh ohde bare haje aapne start nahi kiya.
Executive: Delivery bhi aisa nahi kiya 5 liter, 10 liter start abhi nahi kiya.
Customer: Nahi.
Executive: Okay to abhi wohi hai ki log aapke paas aaye aur aapse leke jaye?
Customer: Haan je koi jyada wala hoye te oh bhej bhi sakte aa, matlab ke koi do char liter ta nahi na bheja janda.
Customer: Koi 100 liter wala houga, koi 10-20 kilometer hoyega de bhi aayenge.
Executive: Hmm, samajh gaya. Theek hai, yeh number WhatsApp pe hai aapka?
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Main ek kaam karta hun agle 5-7-10 din tak na 170 ke hisab se jo calculation ban rahi hai un lead ke link aapko WhatsApp pe bhijwana shuru karta hun dhundh ke fir.
Customer: Haan dekh lena.
Executive: Otherwise main ta main ta fed up ho gaya hun.
Executive: Haan nahi at least yeh cheez try to kare dhundhe to ki mil raha hai ki nahi milti hai ki nahi. Kyunki usme agar is tarah ki lead man lo agar aa rahi hai to fir at least yeh hai na ki aapko mil jaye to apna kaam bane aapka paisa laga hai to.
Customer: Haan bilkul, wahi to gaye hai mere to paise.
Executive: Haan main samajh gaya. Accha Firozpur aur uske aas pass ka ek do jagah ka aur bata do naam jahan se hum matlab buyer ko koi aisi dikkat nahi hogi aane jane mein.
Customer: Nahi naam kiska batau main?
Executive: Aaj aas pass ke shahron ka ya zilon ka area ka jaise Firozpur wale log to local jo hai woh to aa hi jayenge lene man lo agar lena hai kisi ko original.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Aap aise koi aas pass ka aur ek aadha do shahar?
Customer: Nahi yaar aisa nahi hai.
Executive: Aisa nahi hai?
Customer: Nahi.
Executive: Theek hai, theek hai to fir woh to mere ko jo lead dikhengi na 170 ki rate se main woh bhej de raha hun aap open karke dekhna agar quantity aur location ke hisab se aapko theek rahega to aap usko use karke ek bar reply kar lena nahi hoga to fir ignore karna. Haan matlab usi se pata lagega na aap feedback batate rahoge to usse idea lag jayega mujhe.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Theek hai main yeh yahan se close karke aapko WhatsApp pe bhejna shuru kar raha hun.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is not getting relevant buyleads.

- Wants to close his IndiaMART account.

- Claims investment of ₹30,000 is a waste.

- Claims to post a negative video on Facebook.



Resolution:

- Executive will share relevant buyleads on WhatsApp.

- Executive asked for nearby cities for buyers.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will share buyleads on WhatsApp.



Alert (If Any):

- complaint

- risk of churn



@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, account closure, whatsapp, delivery
